result.title: Launch of Bybit DeFi Protocol
result.content: We are thrilled to announce the launch of Bybit's very own DeFi protocol, aiming to enhance decentralized financial services for our users. The platform is designed to be user-friendly, secure, and provide access to a range of new financial instruments. The protocol goes live on May 1, 2023.

result.title: Bybit API Maintenance Completed Successfully
result.content: We are pleased to inform our users that the scheduled maintenance of the Bybit API has been completed successfully. As of April 3, 2023, from 04:00 UTC, all API services have resumed normal operation. We would like to thank you for your patience and support during this period.

result.title: Expansion of Customer Support Channels
result.content: To better serve our growing community, Bybit is expanding its customer support channels. Starting April 10, 2023, our clients will have access to around-the-clock support through new dedicated channels, ensuring timely assistance for all their trading needs.

result.title: Bybit Wins Award for Outstanding Security Measures
result.content: We are proud to share that Bybit has been awarded for 'Outstanding Security Measures' in the cryptocurrency exchange category. Our commitment to providing secure transaction environments continues to be a top priority, and this award is a testament to our team's hard work and innovation.
